author: TravisEz13
body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v6.1.0-rc.1/powershell-preview-6.1.0.rc.1-1.rhel.7.x86_64.rpm
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/download/v6.1.0-preview.4/powershell-preview-6.1.0-preview.4-1.rhel.7.x86_64.rpm

one have a `.` between the version a pre-release label and one has a `-` between the version and prerelease label.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Apparently we have not automated this process and we should so that it is consistent.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Updated release scripts to rename consistently and detect invalid names

title: preview files names are inconsistent between releaseses
